name: Amelie's Café: Halloween
summary: Have you ever wondered why vampires, ghosts, goblins, and other chilling creatures are always so angry? We can come to only one conclusion, they're STARVING! Help feed their need with special treats, as they trudge through the doors of Amelie's Cafe. Just remember, don't make them wait too long for their meal, or they will become more disgruntled than the Frankenstein monster!
